name.ja: マナドゥム・プライムハート

text.en:
1+ Tuners + 1 LIGHT monster
This card can attack a number of times each Battle Phase, up to the number of Tuners used as its Synchro Material. Your opponent cannot target this card Synchro Summoned using a "Manadome" Tuner as material with card effects. If this face-up Synchro Summoned card in its owner's control leaves the field by an opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 of your "Visas Starfrost" or 1 of your monsters with 1500 ATK/2100 DEF that is banished or in your GY.
